name: Dipper And Dipper
description:
A puzzle adventure game !

Dipper and Dipper are too twin brothers that have wandered into the unknown depths of an ancient crypt. Help them avoid many deadly traps, defeat an evil spirit, and find a wonderful treasure !

Mecanics

You control the twins at the same time, so you must think carefully about your relative positions.

There are 9 puzzles and 3 boss fights in the game.

Controls
  • Press R to reload the level
  • Press space to take/put down a crate
  • Press escape to open the pause menu
